properties.description: Custom properties associated with the task.

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: Array of IDs of business units this task is assigned to

hs_at_mentioned_owner_ids.description: Array of IDs of owners mentioned in the task

hs_attachment_ids.description: Array of attachment IDs associated with this task

hs_body_preview.description: Preview of the body content of the task

hs_body_preview_html.description: HTML version of the body content preview

hs_body_preview_is_truncated.description: Indicates if the body preview is truncated

hs_calendar_event_id.description: ID of the associated calendar event, if any

hs_created_by_user_id.description: ID of the user who created the task

hs_createdate.description: The date and time when the task was created

hs_engagement_source_id.description: ID of the source of the engagement task

hs_follow_up_action.description: Action to follow up on the task

hs_gdpr_deleted.description: Indicates if the task has been deleted due to GDPR compliance

hs_lastmodifieddate.description: The date and time when the task was last modified

hs_merged_object_ids.description: Array of IDs of merged objects

hs_modified_by.description: Last user who modified the task

hs_msteams_message_id.description: ID of the Microsoft Teams message associated with the task

hs_num_associated_companies.description: Number of companies associated with the task

hs_num_associated_contacts.description: Number of contacts associated with the task

hs_num_associated_deals.description: Number of deals associated with the task

hs_num_associated_queue_objects.description: Number of queue objects associated with the task

hs_num_associated_tickets.description: Number of tickets associated with the task

hs_object_id.description: ID of the engagement task object

hs_product_name.description: Name of the product associated with the task

hs_queue_membership_ids.description: Array of IDs of queue members associated with the task

hs_scheduled_tasks.description: Array of scheduled tasks related to this task

hs_task_body.description: Full body content of the task

hs_task_completion_date.description: The date and time when the task was completed

hs_task_contact_timezone.description: Timezone of the contact related to the task

hs_task_for_object_type.description: Type of object the task is related to

hs_task_is_all_day.description: Indicates if the task spans the whole day

hs_task_last_contact_outreach.description: The date and time of the last contact outreach related to the task

hs_task_last_sales_activity_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last sales activity related to the task

hs_task_relative_reminders.description: Relative reminders set for the task

hs_task_reminders.description: Specific reminders set for the task

hs_task_send_default_reminder.description: Indicates if default reminders should be sent for the task

hs_task_sequence_enrollment_active.description: Indicates if the task is part of an active sequence enrollment

hs_task_sequence_step_enrollment_id.description: ID of the sequence step enrollment related to the task

hs_task_sequence_step_order.description: Order of the task within the sequence step

hs_task_template_id.description: ID of the task template, if any

hs_timestamp.description: The timestamp associated with the task

hs_updated_by_user_id.description: ID of the user who last updated the task

hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_follower.description: Array of user IDs who are followers and receive notifications

hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_unfollow.description: Array of user IDs who have unfollowed notifications for the task

hs_user_ids_of_all_owners.description: Array of user IDs of all owners

hubspot_owner_assigneddate.description: The date and time when the task was assigned to an owner

hubspot_owner_id.description: ID of the owner of the task in HubSpot

hubspot_team_id.description: ID of the team of the task in HubSpot

hs_all_owner_ids.description: Array of IDs of all owners associated with this task

hs_all_team_ids.description: Array of IDs of all teams associated with this task

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: Array of IDs of teams that have access to this engagement task

properties_hs_all_assigned_business_unit.description: List of all business unit IDs assigned to this task.

properties_hs_at_mentioned_owner_ids.description: List of user IDs mentioned in the task.

properties_hs_attachment_ids.description: List of attachment IDs associated with the task.

properties_hs_body_preview.description: Preview of the task body content.

properties_hs_body_preview_html.description: HTML formatted preview of the task body content.

properties_hs_body_preview_is_truncated.description: Flag indicating if the body preview is truncated.

properties_hs_calendar_event_id.description: ID of the calendar event associated with the task.

properties_hs_created_by_user_id.description: User ID of the task creator.

properties_hs_createdate.description: The date and time when the task was created

properties_hs_engagement_source_id.description: ID of the task engagement source.

properties_hs_follow_up_action.description: Follow-up action associated with the task.

properties_hs_gdpr_deleted.description: Flag indicating if the task is deleted due to GDPR compliance.

properties_hs_lastmodifieddate.description: The date and time when the task was last modified

properties_hs_merged_object_ids.description: List of object IDs merged with this task.

properties_hs_modified_by.description: User who last modified the task.

properties_hs_msteams_message_id.description: ID of the Microsoft Teams message associated with the task.

properties_hs_num_associated_companies.description: Number of companies associated with the task.

properties_hs_num_associated_contacts.description: Number of contacts associated with the task.

properties_hs_num_associated_deals.description: Number of deals associated with the task.

properties_hs_num_associated_queue_objec.description: Number of queue objects associated with the task.

properties_hs_num_associated_tickets.description: Number of tickets associated with the task.

properties_hs_product_name.description: Product name associated with the task.

properties_hs_queue_membership_ids.description: List of queue membership IDs associated with the task.

properties_hs_scheduled_tasks.description: Flag indicating if the task is scheduled.

properties_hs_task_body.description: Full body content of the task.

properties_hs_task_completion_date.description: The date and time when the task was completed

properties_hs_task_contact_timezone.description: Time zone of the contact associated with the task.

properties_hs_task_for_object_type.description: Type of object the task is for (e.g., contact, deal).

properties_hs_task_is_all_day.description: Flag indicating if the task is an all-day task.

properties_hs_task_last_contact_outreach.description: The date and time of the last contact outreach related to the task

properties_hs_task_last_sales_activity_t.description: The date and time of the last sales activity related to the task

properties_hs_task_relative_reminders.description: List of relative reminders set for the task.

properties_hs_task_reminders.description: List of reminders set for the task.

properties_hs_task_send_default_reminder.description: Flag indicating if default reminders should be sent for the task.

properties_hs_task_sequence_enrollment_a.description: Flag indicating if the task sequence enrollment is active.

properties_hs_task_sequence_step_enrollm.description: ID of the task sequence step enrollment.

properties_hs_task_sequence_step_order.description: Order of the task within the sequence step.

properties_hs_task_status.description: Status of the task (e.g., open, closed).

properties_hs_task_type.description: Type of the task (e.g., call, email).

properties_hs_timestamp.description: The timestamp associated with the task

properties_hs_unique_creation_key.description: Unique key for identifying task creation.

properties_hs_updated_by_user_id.description: User ID of the user who last updated the task.

properties_hs_user_ids_of_all_notificati.description: List of user IDs following notifications for the task.
List of user IDs not following notifications for the task.

properties_hs_user_ids_of_all_owners.description: List of user IDs who are owners of the task.

properties_hubspot_owner_assigneddate.description: The date and time when the task was assigned to an owner

properties_hubspot_owner_id.description: ID of the HubSpot owner associated with the task.

properties_hubspot_team_id.description: ID of the HubSpot team associated with the task.

properties_hs_all_owner_ids.description: List of all user IDs who are owners of this task.

properties_hs_all_team_ids.description: List of all team IDs assigned to this task.

properties_hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: List of all team IDs that have access to this task.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the task was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the task was last updated

archived.description: Indicates if the task has been archived

contacts.description: List of contacts associated with the task

deals.description: List of deals associated with the task

companies.description: List of companies associated with the task

tickets.description: List of tickets associated with the task
